subject: No order confirmation yet.
description_text:
Last week week I ordered a set of pedals with haptic feedback and received no order confirmation or proof of purchase but the money was taken from account.

Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

conversations.body_text: Hi Bryan Scearce,     Sorry, since you didn't give us your email, you didn't get the order confirmation and shipping notification. We've added your current email. Your package has been split into two packages for shipping. Here's your tracking link:  https://www.fedex.com/wtrk/track/?trknbr=883412861897  https://www.sf-express.com/chn/en/waybill/waybill-detail/SF60458460320662
